About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

I Putu Wahyu Wiguna, S.Kom

I am a web developer from Karangasem, Bali. Now I live in Denpasar. I like to try new things and like challenges. I graduated in 2019. Now I work as a freelancer for people who need a website for their business. If you need my help, you can contact me.
